property.value: FROM Location AS location WHERE 1=1 /~onlyInvalid: AND location.disabled=true ~/ /~onlyValid: AND location.disabled=false ~/ /~warehouseIds: AND location.warehouse.id IN ({warehouseIds}) ~/ /~code: AND location.code LIKE {code} ~/ /~storageGrade: AND location.storageGrade = {storageGrade} ~/ /~roleWarehouseIds: AND location.warehouse.id IN ({roleWarehouseIds}) ~/ /~warehouse: AND location.warehouse.id = {warehouse} ~/ /~regional: AND location.regional = {regional} ~/ /~locationType: AND location.locationType = {locationType} ~/ /~bearload: AND location.bearload = {bearload} ~/ /~status: AND location.status = {status} ~/ /~sortColumn: ORDER BY location.[sortColumn] [sortDirection] ~/

property.name: hql
property.value: FROM SubscribeCollectBill AS scb WHERE 1=1 /~onlyInvalid: AND scb.disabled=true ~/ /~onlyValid: AND scb.disabled=false ~/ /~code: AND scb.code LIKE {code} ~/ /~name: AND scb.name LIKE {name} ~/ /~billStatus: AND scb.billStatus = {billStatus} ~/ /~collectPerson.name: AND scb.collectPerson.name LIKE {collectPerson.name} ~/ /~collectDept.id: AND scb.collectDept.id = {collectDept.id}~/ /~collectDate_start: AND scb.collectDate >= {collectDate_start} ~/ /~collectDate_end: AND scb.collectDate <= {collectDate_end} ~/ /~billStatus: AND scb.billStatus = {billStatus} ~/ /~sortColumn: ORDER BY scb.[sortColumn] [sortDirection] ~/

property.name: defaultSortColumn
property.value: subscribe.department.id,id

property.name: defaultSortDirection
property.value: desc

property.name: hql
property.value: FROM SubscribeDetail AS subscribeDetail WHERE 1=1 /~subscribeCollectBill.id: AND subscribeDetail.subscribeCollectBill.id = {subscribeCollectBill.id} ~/ /~graphNo: AND subscribeDetail.graphNo = {graphNo} ~/ /~name: AND subscribeDetail.name = {name} ~/ /~model: AND subscribeDetail.model = {model} ~/ /~category.name: AND subscribeDetail.category.name = {category.name} ~/ /~detailCategory.name: AND subscribeDetail.detailCategory.name = {detailCategory.name} ~/ /~department: AND subscribeDetail.department = {department} ~/ /~subscribe.subscribeDate: AND subscribeDetail.subscribe.subscribeDate = {subscribe.subscribeDate} ~/ /~subscribe.totalAmounts: AND subscribeDetail.subscribe.totalAmounts = {subscribe.totalAmounts} ~/ /~spare.stocks: AND subscribeDetail.spare.stocks = {spare.stocks} ~/ /~buyeAmount: AND subscribeDetail.buyeAmount = {buyeAmount} ~/ /~purchaseDate: AND subscribeDetail.purchaseDate = {purchaseDate} ~/ /~unitPrice: AND subscribeDetail.unitPrice = {unitPrice} ~/ /~totalPrice: AND subscribeDetail.totalPrice = {totalPrice} ~/ /~arrivalAmount: AND subscribeDetail.arrivalAmount = {arrivalAmount} ~/ /~arrivalDate: AND subscribeDetail.arrivalDate = {arrivalDate} ~/ /~factory: AND subscribeDetail.factory = {factory} ~/ /~supplierName: AND subscribeDetail.supplierName = {supplierName} ~/ /~sortColumn: ORDER BY subscribeDetail.[sortColumn] [sortDirection]~/

property.name: hql
property.value: FROM SpareLocation AS location WHERE 1=1 /~warehouse: AND location.warehouse = {warehouse} ~/ /~spareid: AND location.spare.id = {spareid} ~/ /~spare.graphNo: AND location.spare.graphNo = {spare.graphNo} ~/ /~spare.name: AND location.spare.name = {spare.name} ~/ /~spare.specification: AND location.spare.specification = {spare.specification} ~/ /~spare.spareDetailType: AND location.spare.spareDetailType = {spare.spareDetailType} ~/ /~stocks: AND location.stocks = {stocks} ~/ /~locationCode: AND location.locationCode = {locationCode} ~/ /~sortColumn: ORDER BY location.[sortColumn] [sortDirection] ~/

property.name: hql
property.value:
FROM SpareOutBillDetail AS spareOutBillDetail, WHERE 1=1 AND spareOutBillDetail.status = 'OUTWAREHOUSEED' AND spareOutBillDetail.number>spareOutBillDetail.inNumber
/~spareOutBillName: AND spareOutBillDetail.spareOutBill.name LIKE {spareOutBillName} ~/ /~spareOutBillCode: AND spareOutBillDetail.spareOutBill.code LIKE {spareOutBillCode} ~/ /~department.id: AND spareOutBillDetail.spareOutBill.department.id = {department.id} ~/ /~spareNo: AND spareOutBillDetail.spare.graphNo LIKE {spareNo} ~/ /~spareName: AND spareOutBillDetail.spare.name LIKE {spareName} ~/ /~spareModelSpecs: AND spareOutBillDetail.spare.modelSpecs LIKE {spareModelSpecs} ~/ /~spareType.id: AND spareOutBillDetail.spare.category.id = {spareType.id} ~/ /~spareDetailType.id: AND spareOutBillDetail.spare.spareDetailType.id = {spareDetailType.id} ~/ /~wareHouse.id: AND spareOutBillDetail.spareOutBill.warehouse.id = {wareHouse.id} ~/ /~outWarehouseId: AND spareOutBillDetail.spareOutBill.inWarehouse.id = {outWarehouseId} ~/ /~sortColumn: ORDER BY location.[sortColumn] [sortDirection] ~/

property.name: hql
property.value:
FROM SpareLocation AS spareLocation WHERE 1=1
/~name: AND spareLocation.spare.name LIKE {name} ~/ /~model: AND spareLocation.spare.modelSpecs LIKE {model} ~/ /~code: AND spareLocation.spare.spareNo LIKE {code} ~/ /~locationCode: AND spareLocation.location.code LIKE {locationCode} ~/ /~factory.name: AND spareLocation.spare.factory.name = {factory.name} ~/ /~regional.id: AND spareLocation.regional.id = {regional.id} ~/ /~warehouse.id: AND spareLocation.warehouse.id = {warehouse.id} ~/ /~locationCode: AND spareLocation.location.code LIKE {locationCode} ~/ /~orderNo: AND spareLocation.spare.orderNo LIKE {orderNo} ~/
/~spareEnName: AND spareLocation.spare.enName LIKE {spareEnName} ~/
/~category.id: AND spareLocation.spare.category.id = {category.id} ~/ /~spareDetailType.id: AND spareLocation.spare.spareDetailType.id = {spareDetailType.id} ~/ /~sortColumn: ORDER BY spareLocation.[sortColumn] [sortDirection]~/

property.name: hql
property.value:
FROM SubscribeDetail AS detail WHERE 1=1
/~name: AND detail.name LIKE {name} ~/ /~modelSpace: AND detail.model LIKE {modelSpace} ~/ /~dept.id: AND detail.subscribe.department.id = {dept.id} ~/ /~subDate: AND detail.subscribe.subscribeDate = {subDate} ~/ /~subDate_start: AND detail.subscribe.subscribeDate >= {subDate_start} ~/ /~subDate_end: AND detail.subscribe.subscribeDate <= {subDate_end} ~/ /~billStatus: AND detail.status = {billStatus} ~/ /~purNum: AND detail.buyeAmount = {purNum} ~/ /~purDate: AND detail.purchaseDate = {purDate} ~/ /~purDate_start: AND detail.purchaseDate >= {purDate_start} ~/ /~purDate_end: AND detail.purchaseDate <= {purDate_end} ~/ /~sortColumn: ORDER BY detail.[sortColumn] [sortDirection]~/

property.name: hql
property.value: FROM PurchaseBill AS bill WHERE 1=1 /~supplier.name: AND bill.supplier.name like {supplier.name} ~/ /~purchaseDate_start: AND bill.purchaseDate >= {purchaseDate_start} ~/ /~purchaseDate_end: AND bill.purchaseDate < {purchaseDate_end} ~/ /~sortColumn: ORDER BY bill.[sortColumn] [sortDirection]~/

property.name: hql
property.value: FROM Subscribe AS subscribe WHERE 1=1 /~onlyInvalid: AND subscribe.disabled=true ~/ /~onlyValid: AND subscribe.disabled=false ~/ /~department.id: AND subscribe.department.id = {department.id} ~/ /~subscribeDate_start: AND subscribe.subscribeDate >= {subscribeDate_start} ~/ /~subscribeDate_end: AND subscribe.subscribeDate < {subscribeDate_end} ~/ /~sortColumn: ORDER BY subscribe.[sortColumn] [sortDirection]~/

property.name: hql
property.value:
FROM SubscribeCountByDeptReport AS view WHERE 1=1 /~department.id: AND view.deptId = {department.id} ~/ /~month: AND view.month = {month} ~/
ORDER BY view.id asc

property.name: hql
property.value:
FROM PurchaseCountBySupplierReport AS view WHERE 1=1 and view.supplierName is not null /~supplier.name: AND view.supplierName LIKE {supplier.name} ~/ /~month: AND view.month = {month} ~/
ORDER BY view.id asc

property.name: hql
property.value: FROM PurchaseBill AS purchaseBill WHERE 1=1 AND purchaseBill.toolingDevFlag='DEVICE' /~onlyInvalid: AND purchaseBill.disabled=true ~/ /~onlyValid: AND purchaseBill.disabled=false ~/ /~supplier.name: AND purchaseBill.supplier.name like {supplier.name} ~/ /~purchaseDate_start: AND purchaseBill.purchaseDate >= {purchaseDate_start} ~/ /~purchaseDate_end: AND purchaseBill.purchaseDate <= {purchaseDate_end} ~/ /~sortColumn: ORDER BY purchaseBill.[sortColumn] [sortDirection]~/
